createdAt.description: The timestamp when the email subscription was created

signupSource.description: The source where the subscriber signed up for the emails

emailListIds.description: List of email list identifiers the subscriber belongs to

itblInternal.description: Internal properties related to the subscription

documentCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the internal document was created

documentUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the internal document was last updated

emailListId.description: The unique identifier of the email list

email.description: The email address of the subscriber

userId.description: The unique identifier of the subscriber user

profileUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the subscriber profile was last updated

workflowId.description: The identifier of the workflow associated with the subscription
